on top.translation[0].definitions[0].def: on the highest part or surface of something
on top.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The cake was a bit burnt on top.
a high roof with a chimney on top
on top.translation[0].definitions[1].def: on the highest part of your head
on top.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Can you cut it quite short on top, please.
on top.translation[0].definitions[2].def: winning in a game or competition
on top.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: After the first set, the Australian was comfortably on top.
